ftbquests.ui.pinned_quests_inset_x.toolt:
Inset is toward center of screen.
Ignored if X pos is center.
ftbquests.chapter.image.hover.tooltip: You can use literal text or translation keys here
ftbquests.ui.old_scroll_wheel.tooltip:
When false, scroll wheel scrolls up & down: hold Shift to pan, Ctrl to zoom
When true, scroll wheel only zooms (1.19 and earlier behavior)
ftbquests.quest.visibility.hide_text_unt: Hide Text Until Quest is Completed
ftbquests.quest.visibility.hide: Hide Quest Until Dependencies are Visible
commands.ftbquests.command.feedback.clea: Item display cache has been cleared for all players
ftbquests.quest.dependencies.hide_depend: Controls display of dependency lines to quests which are unlocked by this one
ftbquests.quest.visibility.hide_details_: If true, then quest details (text and tasks) can't be viewed until the quest can be started
Sneak + Right-Click a Task Screen block to bind
ftbquests.message.task_screen_inaccessib: Task Screen is not accessible from here!
ftbquests.quest.misc.ignore_reward_block: Offer the quest reward(s) even if rewards are blocked for the team by the '/ftbquests block_rewards' command
ftbquests.quest.visibility.invisible_unt: Invisible until X tasks are completed
ftbquests.file.pause_game.tooltip: Does not apply to multiplayer games
ftbquests.gui.key_reference.player:
General Controls
-;Zoom out
+;Zoom in
0;Reset Zoom
Tab;Next Chapter
Shift + Tab;Previous Chapter
1 - 9;Go to Chapter
Space;Recenter View
Ctrl + F;Search
F1;While hovering quest, show extended info
Left Mouse;View Quest Details
Mouse Wheel;Scroll Up/Down
Shift + Mouse Wheel;Scroll Left/Right
Ctrl + Mouse Wheel;Zoom In/Out
ftbquests.chapter.misc.require_sequentia: When true, tasks must be completed in the strict order in which they were added to the quest
ftbquests.chapter.appearance.default_min: Default Min Opened Quest Window Width
ftbquests.reward.ftbquests.command.eleva: Run the command as if the player had permission level 2
ftbquests.chapter.misc.autofocus_id.tool:
If not empty, must be a Quest or Quest Link ID (use Copy Quest ID to obtain).
When chapter is opened, the panel will automatically center the view on this quest
ftbquests.quest.visibility.invisible.too:
Quest is invisible to players until completed.
Useful for "easter egg" optional quests.
ftbquests.quest.cannot_copy_many: Copying multiple objects is not supported!
ftbquests.ui.pinned_quests_inset_y.toolt:
Inset is toward center of screen.
Ignored if Y pos is center.
ftbquests.quest.misc.require_sequential_:
When true, tasks must be completed in the strict order in which they were added to the quest
Default means to use chapter setting
ftbquests.quest.appearance.icon_scale.to: Independent of the overall button size
ftbquests.gui.key_reference.editor:
Editor Mode
Ctrl + Left Mouse;Toggle Selection
Middle Mouse;Move Selected Quest(s)
Right Mouse;Context Menu
Middle Mouse: Drag;Select Quests in Drag Box
Ctrl + Middle Mouse: Drag;Toggle Selection in Box
Ctrl + A;Select All
Ctrl + D;Select None
Ctrl + Up/Down/Left/Right;Move Selected Quests
Ctrl + R;Toggle Crosshairs
Ctrl + C;Copy Selected/Hovered Object
Ctrl + V;Paste Selection
Ctrl + Shift + V;Paste Quest (no dependencies)
Ctrl + Alt + V;Paste as Quest Link

Quest View Panel
T;Edit Quest Title
S;Edit Quest Subtitle
D;Edit Quest Description
ftbquests.quest.visibility.invisible_unt:
Only applies if Invisible is true.
If > 0, quest becomes visible if X or more tasks are completed.
